paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val122Ile, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Given that 3% to 4% of Black Americans are carriers of the Val122Ile variant (originating in western Africa), the most common variant in the United States.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant is associated with increased risk of developing ATTR-CM.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common in the United States.
key_quotes: Given that 3% to 4% of Black Americans are carriers of the Val122Ile variant (originating in western Africa), the most common variant in the United States.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on the TTR gene variant Val122Ile.
